main.name: Vy Dinh
main.bio: Experienced Software Engineer with a demonstrated history of 3 years working in the Information Technology. Skilled in Java, Javascript, C++ languages, OOP concepts, Spring Boot, Reactjs, Node.js, Docker and Kubernetes.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: I'm a tinkerer and am always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over

work.title: Cloud Engineer
work.description:
Working in the Cloud Native team. Take responsibility for deployment of application images to Openstack cloud machines of the end users. 

Installs and configures operating systems on the servers. 

Support of OpenStack port security is enabled in customer infrastructure as they see a security risks for IMS operation.

work.title: Software Engineer - Maintenance/Delivery Management team
work.description:
Working with the Maintenance team/Project Delivery Management team for the Control Function of the IP Multimedia Subsystem. 

Take responsibility for technical maintenance tasks, supporting delivery tasks, and working closely with the maintenance manager/supervisor to ensure objectives and timescales are met.

work.title: Software Engineer - Development team
work.description:
As a software engineer at DEK Technology, Im working in the international teams (Sweden + Vietnam) to develop the features for the Control Function of the IP Multimedia Subsystem (e.g., the feature helps the customer gets faster call set-up times and higher KPIs for VoLTE quality in their networks to win the mobile network competition.). 

Collaborating with teammates, project owner and system manager in Sweden to clarify requirements, finding and implementing solutions.

Operating under Agile and Scrum to complete release and well-organized sprints.

projects.title: Hey Device
projects.category: An open source device that reminds the development team to focus on their continuous integration and fix appearing bugs

projects.title: Thesis
projects.category: Velocity Measurement of The Moving Object Using Microwave Motion Sensor Module

testimonials.text:
I just wanted to say a big thank to Vy for her great contribution to our team. 
It was a pleasure to work with you, you have been putting a lot of energy in our team work since the beginning. VoLTE, for example, was very important for customer and you did a great work on this. 
 Team is really lucky to have you on board.
testimonials.user: Eduardo . Product Owner at DEK Technologies
